WRITING.TEXT: Champion77117, I'm a ps4 player, I mostly play as a medic and always play the objective
You are a true hero!

WRITING.TITLE: [Deck] My giant graveyard deck, 3524 at the moment.

WRITING.TEXT: This deck is working really well for me at the moment, I'm still learning the finesses of it and will probably reach even higher trophies in the near future. If anyone is interested in a strategy for it I would be happy to share!

Start of the game: I will preferably start the game with a tombstone in the middle, if this is not available I will start a giant or executioner in the back. Offense: In single elixir time you are somewhat limited in what you can put down on your push, i prefer a straight up giant executioner. The graveyard is tricky since I wil only use it when I have enough elixir to place it and have a backup spell. Double elixir time is where this deck really shines. You can put the giant with the executioner down, put a mega minion with him and have enough elixir for a graveyard and a tornado. Defense: This deck is quite strong defensively, and if you run into defensive trouble you can start using the executioner tornado combo on defense, to take out almost every push. Remember to put a giant in front after your defense to force a reaction from your opponent. Card roles: -Giant: The not so friendly giant is the tank of this deck, use him to start pushes and tank for your graveyard. He is a formidable danger to the towers even without the graveyard. Graveyard: Your main win condition. This spell can shred a tower in mere seconds when tanked for. This card should be used only when positive you have enough elixir to take out your opponents counters to the graveyard, usually with the executioner tornado combo. Can be used defensively as a last resort but I don't recommend it. Executioner: The most OP card in the game right now. Destroys everything and is brilliant on defense as well as offense. If the game is not going your way you use this guy to defend and then start a counter. If your opponent has a hard counter like a knight, valkyrie or mini pekka don't ever play him without being able to use tornado to pull them away from him. Tornado: A high skill card that is deadly when used right in combination with the executioner. Use this to activate your king tower, pull troops to the middle and in combination with the executioner. When using it on offense you need to make sure that you pull the troops in a fashion that allows the axe of executioner to clip the tower as well, dealing a lot of tower damage while killing your enemies troops. Mega Minion: Mainly your defensive card, can be used to guard the executioner as well. Is capable of taking out an executioner if played well Skarmy: Use this defensively against basically everything, only real problem against them is the executioner, and mix up placement to prevent prediction spells. Tombstone: Defensive building, use it to pull troops toward the middle, and help take them out. Zap: Use it zap squishy troops, reset inferno's, and for the occasional re target. Extra tip, in a few games where my executioner kept being rocketed I held off on using him with push, but this was a big problem because my opponent had a minion horde to counter the graveyard. I have since found out that a zap tornado works wonders for minions as well, and is really unexpected.
Love that one as well, on par with him telling Negan that he's already dead.

WRITING.TITLE: Prince Buff
WRITING.TEXT: I feel the Prince is massively underpowerd, especially if you compare them to cards like elite barbarians and mini pekka. He isn't as good defensively and not much better attacking. To buff the Prince I would give him a faster attack speed but slighty lower hit damage.
Pretty much every card in the game can be countered by a 1 or 2 elixir card if on it's own.. Not really sure what point you are trying to get across.
Connor really did MMA proud!

WRITING.TITLE: I could use some advice.
WRITING.TEXT: I'm a guy that was until very recently strictly heterosexual. Then I kissed a guy when I was drunk and now I've been thinking about trying something more with another man. How should I go about doing this?
I do have one very close gay friend but I don't think it would be a good idea for something to happen between us.. it would probably become very awkward between us
Okay, I will definitely try that. Thanks for your help!
Me?
Hey man, can you PM me too?

WRITING.TITLE: [Question] Is season 6 worth watching?
WRITING.TEXT: All I see on the sub is everybody hating on season 6 but is it really so bad that I shouldn't even bother with watching it?
So happy to hear that Slade's gonna be back again!! Will probably watch the whole season to be fair, just hoping Olicity won't be too bad.. will Vigilante come back again?

Deathstroke is one of my favourite DC characters so seeing him again is really awesome to me. I really enjoyed him in the season 5 finale and season 6 opener as well. Hopefully he will make more appearances in the future
Then why are you still on this sub?
Less than an hour, can't wait!!
This was by far the greatest night of my life, I am in awe. All hail Kung Fu Kenny!
I really like this one myself: https://m.imgur.com/gallery/ofbL7pr
Bitch, don't kill my vibe??

WRITING.TITLE: The Heart Part 4
WRITING.TEXT: Whenever I listen to the first verse I go to another world and just feel bliss. Anyone else love it as much as I do?
Being in the middle of these moshpits was fucking amazing!
95, the number I have on my kart and which I have raced with for my whole life.
This is what I use as well, great wheel.

WRITING.TITLE: I just really love Austria.
WRITING.TEXT: Not much else to add, I just love this track so damn much, feels amazing to just drive laps around here.
It feels sooo rewarding when you get it right
Damn, that's really nice. I just set a top 9% time on the ps4 an hour ago, really happy with that.
Just started up the ps4 again to check, I' m position 2508 with a 1:06:363, really close to your time, gonna try and beat it soon
Looks like we have a bit of a rivalry coming up then don't we..
I mostly agree with you, but I just really can't stand Baku, I absolutely hate that track.
I adore Suzuka and Monaco, the second sector of Monaco is my favourite sector in the whole calendar, feels so nice.
Looks like you're gonna have to try again, I just did a 1:06:129 https://imgur.com/gallery/g69I1
Yes exactly that part, just flows really well. Though it might help that I'm on the wheel, are you on a pad?
Really? I probably wouldn't even be playing f1 if I didn't have a wheel, it just feels so much more natural and immersive.
Oh no, I agree, that doesn't look very comfortable fot actual racing use
We're going to be pushing each other to the limit, I'll try again as soon as I can.
I don't feel so good

WRITING.TITLE: What is wrong with the Mexico esses?
WRITING.TEXT: In F1 2018 you can take the esses with just slightly braking for the first lefthander, but in real life drivers brake for the second right hander as well. Why is that corner so much less sharp in the games?

WRITING.TITLE: My pc keeps overheating.
WRITING.TEXT: My pc keeps overheating and I am not sure what causes it or how to fix it. I have a GeForce GTX 1060 6GB graphics card and an Intel Core i5-6400 processor. In the case itself are 4 fans. I bought this pc like 3 years ago and would really like some help to fix this, as I know next to nothing about building a pc. Image of the case: http://imgur.com/gallery/stcZNfC I hope this is enough information, otherwise let me know what else I should tell.
I think the cpu it's the cpu. The whole computer will just freeze when it happens, becoming completely unresponsive and the cpu will be extremely hot.
I am pretty certain the cpu is overheating. I will try to look into the actual temps, but when the computer freezes it is almost too hot to touch.
Because it tends to happen way more in the summer. Putting a fan next to it helped a lot as well, though this is a bit difficult with my current setup
This may seem very dumb, but how would I go about removing the cooler? I don't see any very apparent screws or anything.
Thank you, I just figured it out. Now I just need to go get some new thermal paste, and maybe even a new cooler.
Thank you for the help!

WRITING.TITLE: I am not having fun.
WRITING.TEXT: I was extremely excited for the release of Master Mirror and played a lot of Wild Hunt on the release day. Since the first days I have barely played the game though. It feels like almost every game I play is against the same Skellige deck and I feel I have almost no chance of winning. The only counter seems to be playing another Skellige deck or a specific counter deck. I was just looking forward to trying out the new decks like Wild Hunt, but losing every game is not fun to me. I just hope the next patch comes soon. Sorry for the rant, I just needed to vent somewhere!

WRITING.TITLE: Should I use Divinity Unleashed?
WRITING.TEXT: I am now playing the game for the first time (have just defeated the shriekers and I now have to fight the magisters). But I do kind of really dislike the armour system, as I feel it really limits the kind of builds you can make with your team. I would really like to play a hybrid team with 2 warriors and 2 mages but that feels extremely awkward with the physical and magical armour ratings. Is Divinity Unleashed a good "fix"? Or is it really not recommended for first time players? Thanks in advance!!
